revision.text:
{{ZScriptNote}} '''[[Structs:SecPlane|SecPlane]]'''
native clearscope double '''ZatPoint'''(Vector2 ''v'') const
==Usage== Gets the z height of the SecPlane at the given xy coordinate. This can be used to get the ceiling or floor height of a Sector or 3D floor. Note that this method of doing it ''will not'' account for sector portals.
===Parameters=== *''v'' - The absolute xy map coordinate to check.
===Return Value=== Returns the z height of the plane at the given point.
==Examples== {{noexamples}}
[[Category:ZScript]] [[Category:SecPlane]]
